item.title: hugo
item.description:
Learn theme guide:
https://matcornic.github.io/hugo-learn-doc/basics/

Hugo set port:
https://discuss.gohugo.io/t/hugo-port/212

hugo server -p 1234

Writing theme specific code on here and having it show up:
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/matcornic/hugo-learn-doc/master/content/cont/shortcodes/index.md

Button:

{{% button %}}{{% /button %}}

item.title: html
item.description:
Nice HTML5 skeleton:
https://www.taniarascia.com/basic-html5-file/

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

  <title></title>

  <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/main.css">
  <link rel="icon" href="images/favicon.png">
</head>

<body>

  <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.1.4/jquery.min.js"></script>
  <script src="js/script.js"></script>
</body>

</html>

item.title: js
item.description:
Using the date function.
http://www.w3schools.com/jsref/jsref_obj_date.asp

new Date().toTimeString().toString() in Node-RED gives me a nice easily readable timestamp.
